titles.title: As We Gather In Your Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As we gather in Your name
Every weight we lay aside;
May Your presence now be known
As we worship You alone,
May Your name be magnified,
Have Your way in every heart,
And we will never be the same.
Jesus use this time we share,
For Your kingdom, hearts prepare.
As we gather in Your name.
